amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide, $800,000 for the Tulane Center for Missile Defense, Louisiana.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1262 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1262 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S9391-9392; text: CR S9392) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide, $800,000 for the Tulane Center for Missile Defense, Louisiana.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1262 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Breaux.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1262 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
